text: @GavinNewsom Orange County and San Diego County have extremely low Covid-19 deaths (unverified) at .0018% and .0045% of respective populations. That is NOT a pandemic. LIFT STAY-AT-HOME Orders - OPEN ALL BUSINESSES.
